properties.areaDesc: Marengo, AL; Greene, AL; Hale, AL
properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 5 at 7:13PM CST until February 10 at 7:20AM CST by NWS Birmingham AL
properties.description:
...The flood warning continues for the Black Warrior River At Selden
Lock and Dam...

.Heavy rainfall that has already occurred, along with additional
rain expected over the next 24 hours, will continue to lead to
significant rises on the Black Warrior River. A Flood Warning
remains in effect for the Black Warrior at Selden Lock and Dam.

The Flood Warning continues for
The Black Warrior River At Selden Lock and Dam.
* from Friday evening to Monday morning...or until the warning is
cancelled.
* At  7:00 PM Wednesday the stage was 76.2 feet.
* Flood stage is 90.0 feet.
* Minor flooding is forecast.
* Forecast...Rise above flood stage by Friday night and continue to
rise to near 92.0 feet by Saturday evening. The river will fall
below flood stage by Sunday evening.
* Impact...At 94.0 feet...Some secondary roads in the area begin to
flood. Flooding of farm and pasture lands continues.
properties.instruction:
Do not drive cars through flooded areas.  Turn Around...Don't Drown.

Another statement will be issued by Thursday morning...or sooner if
conditions warrant.
